interpretation:
The "writing hand" emoji represents the power of communication and self-expression. This card is all about taking action and making your voice heard. It encourages you to express your ideas, thoughts, and feelings through writing, speaking, or any other means of communication. It reminds you that your words have the power to inspire, motivate, and influence others.

This card can also signify the need to take a more active role in your life and make things happen. It encourages you to take the pen into your own hands and write your own story. Don't wait for someone else to do it for you.

In a reading, this card may suggest that you need to speak up, write that letter, or have that difficult conversation. It can also indicate a time of creativity and inspiration, where your ideas and words are flowing freely.
